title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes the first criterion below, but not the remaining criteria.
The response accurately includes the two criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The response accurately includes the first criterion below, but not the remaining criteria.
The response accurately includes the two criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that the domestic consumer surplus decreases and the domestic producer surplus increases.
The response states the domestic consumer surplus decreases and the domestic producer surplus increases.
